mapper.insert: insert into s_tbl_product(p_name, p_price, p_cate1, p_cate2, p_stock, s_id, p_dis_rate, p_favo, p_sale_cnt) values(#{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_cate1}, #{p_cate2}, #{p_stock}, #{s_id}, #{p_dis_rate}, #{p_favo}, #{p_sale_cnt})
insert into s_tbl_option(o_title, o_cont, o_stock, p_name, s_id) values(#{o_title}, #{o_cont}, #{o_stock}, #{p_name}, #{s_id})
